bladdr 0.0.8.0

    • using-pcr-functions

Calculate library PCR concentrations

pcr_lib_calc.Rd

Calculate library PCR concentrations

pcr_lib_calc(tidy_pcr, dil_factor = 1000)

Arguments

tidy_pcr

a dataset run that has been run through pcr_tidy()
dil_factor

the factor to which the libraries were diluted for pcr

Value

a list, containing the original dataframe, data on the standards, and data on the samples.

Examples


dat_path <- system.file("extdata", "untidy-standard-curve.xlsx", package = "bladdr")

pcr_tidy(dat_path) %>%
pcr_lib_calc()
